articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.title: Tandem OLED is OLED’s latest weapon in holding off MicroLED, QDEL - Ars Technica
articles.description: Brighter and tougher, Tandem RGB stacks may help OLED keep its display reign.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ Like a Tandem bicycle, Tandem OLED doubles certain components for exciting momentum.
